title: Wine Pairing for Hoisin-Glazed Salmon

items.name: Chardonnay (recommended)
items.details: Richer body stands up nicely to the savory-sweet hoisin glaze on salmon. Best choice for this meal.

items.name: Sauvignon Blanc
items.details: Also works well but lighter. A good alternative if you prefer something crisper.

notes: Meal: Hoisin-glazed salmon with white rice and asparagus with parmesan. Chardonnay is the preferred pairing due to its richer body complementing the savory-sweet glaze.
